DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE OF EVALUATION : This study verify & validate acceptability Egret 's extend use product compare existing daily change-out product . Based extensive in-vitro study , Egret 's product confirm significant kill positive negative gram bacteria . In addition meeting current product requirement , total aerobic bio-burden catheter test various interval 10 day use . The current used product use control group change daily per current policy . The control group test total aerobic bacteria count last day use .
DOC.brief_title: Study Average Aerobic Bioburden Levels Catheters After Use With Egret Catheter Predicate Device

Egret address concern incorporate unique squeegee-and-filter design facilitate tip clean prevents debris migrate clean chamber sleeve area . IV . BENEFTS OF THE EGRET MEDICAL DEVICE 1 . The catheter contain non-leaching antimicrobial agent enables product use safely fourteen ( 10 ) day . 2 . Based previous in-vitro testing , Egret product BIOSAFE find reduce bacteria count extend time . 3 . Minimizing frequency change-out close catheter system reduce chance cross-contamination since air way open less frequently , e.g. , every five day versus daily . 4 . Less frequent product change-out reduces need manipulate ET-Tube . The ET-Tube manipulate , great chance upper airway content trap cuff enter pulmonary bed . 5 . An integrated positive lock valve facilitates use prevents gas escaping use . 8 .
